item.title: Intro to Personal Security
item.description: Photo by Annie Spratt on Unsplash Personal Security The world in recent decades has undergone a revolutionary shift in the way we work, live, communicate, and interact as a society. 30 years ago we were debating whether or not to buy into this whole internet thing, deciding when the best time was to interrupt your phone line. Today, we’re faced with AI which can help draft legally-worded letters to landlords and lawyers (and you).
